item.description:
On our recent trip to Whitehall Reservoir, the general consensus was that this was a beautiful location and would be great for a foliage trip. We may have to reschedule as it gets closer (they are predicting earlier than usual foliage this year due to the dry weather), but this should be close to peak. So...

Kayak/Canoe Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton, ***SUNDAY*** October 14 at 11:00am.

Parking/launch area is at Whitehall State Park on Rt. 135 in Hopkinton.
item.name: Foliage Trip - Kayak Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton
